name: Slime Shooter (JaooPhez)
description:
My second project, testing particles and walking enemies. Defeat everyone you see in front of you and collect the keys. The Sprites and songs used are not my authorship, and all can be found here on the itch.io website.

Fight the big boss of the swamp, who throws slime balls at you which you must have the skill to dodge, so can you do it?

The game is controlled only by the arrow keys on the keyboard.

If you can rate the game, it will help me a lot.

Thanks for playing my game.
